bugs.summary: Update libdav1d to 0.8.0 for Firefox 85
Add VA-API decode path to bundled ffvpx
Revert media.navigator.mediadatadecoder_vpx_enabled to false
Update libcubeb to 5c2cf2677
Perma TEST-UNEXPECTED-PASS | /html/browsers/the-window-object/window-properties.https.html | Window unforgeable attribute: window - expected FAIL when Gecko 85 merges to Beta on 2020-12-14
Cleanup Gamepad-related code
Crash when navigating from about:* to view-source:http(s):* on debug build
Origin header field is not set to HTTP request in cases where it is required
select() is no-op for disconnected text controls
Changing selectionDirection value does not fire select event when the range is collapsed
Make select events from input/textarea.select() asynchronous
Stop using `UINT32_MAX`, `INT32_MAX`, `LONG_MAX`, and `-1` if they mean "no composition" in IME handling
Additional blur and focus event get fired while calling iframe.focus() on OOP iframe
dom/webauthn/libudev-sys is third party code
Make alerts fully accessible to VoiceOver
Redo control flow in qcms_modular_transform_create.
Fix up some of the unstructured control flow.
Cleanup qcms_modular_transform_release.
Use default initialization for qcms_modular_transform.
Explicitly instantiate often-used profiler templates
Accelerate font fallback by avoiding freetype face creation where possible
Assert we don't lose WebRender if we force it on via MOZ_WEBRENDER
Update to mozangle 0.3.2.
Disable WebRender on gen6 on win7
RenderDXGITextureHost::MapPlane() is called even when RenderCompositorD3D11SWGL uses external compositing for video rendering(sw-wr)
Drop now unneeded blocking of WebRender on gen6.
Performance on gen6 win7 is bad
Several links from the “About Firefox” panel are sometimes not working when it is opened for the second/third/nth time
Remove JS_MORE_DETERMINISTIC in favor of a runtime option
Reproducible WriteStructuredClone crash with MOZ_RELEASE_ASSERT(!Done())
Implement the Top-level await proposal
script-source-extent.js test is sensitive to GC timing
Remove IonBuilder and TI
Visual Studio 2017 fails to compile SM headers because of StructGCPolicy static assert
OOM running hazard analysis on local desktop
Add assertions to check that we don't leak arenas
Crash in [@ _pthread_join]
Constant fold SIMD binary operations

Perma Tier 2 /css/css-break/block-001-wm-vlr-print.html | Testing http://web-platform.test:8000/css/css-break/block-001-wm-vlr-print.html == http://web-platform.test:8000/css/css-break/block-001-wm-vlr-ref.html

Intermittent /css/css-grid/grid-items/grid-auto-margin-and-replaced-item-001.html | Testing http://web-platform.test:8000/css/css-grid/grid-items/grid-auto-margin-and-replaced-item-001.html == grid-items/grid-auto-margin-and-replaced-item-001-ref

Intermittent TEST-UNEXPECTED-PASS | /css/css-text-decor/text-underline-offset-overline-vertical.html | Testing css/css-text-decor/text-underline-offset-overline-vertical.html == css/css-text-decor/reference/text-underline-offset-overline-vertical-ref.html
Clean up unused esni code
ThreadSanitizer: data race [@ nsJARChannel::Suspend] vs. [@ nsJARChannel::Resume]
Add platform support to check if page range exceeds the current number of pages
[mochitest-bc-tsan] Enable mochitest-bc tests as Tier1 on TSan
crlite processes new stashes in O(n^2), whereas it can be O(n)
Sandbox crashes when building with rustc >= 1.48
Abort operations for given directory lock ids
[wfh] Session statistics disappear from about:webrtc when exiting video-call with close tab
Improve non-native theme with fractional scaling.
[wayland] Connect nsRefreshDrivers in content processes with a widget-local vsync source
Make nsCancelableRunnable an abstract class
Remove failure check for CheckAndCreateBloatView() and rename it.
Allow querying file creation time in nsIFile
Bring the Rust language binding into the Glean repositories
Enable legacy listener for targets that watcher actor doesn't support
Remote debugging fails on requests returning arrays
Remove backward compatibility code in GridFront
Symbol dumping silently broken on mac openh264 builds
Use PATH instead of -B
Add openh264 builds for Apple silicon mac
Hiding "Other Bookmarks" folder only happens per window leading to unsynced bookmarks toolbar
"No bookmarks" message on empty bookmarks toolbar cannot be used as a drop target for new bookmarks, making bookmarks creation there error-prone
error: attribute should be applied to a function or static
Cleanup webm/mp4 files that were used in the multistage about:welcome privacy screen experiment
[Firefox Alpenglow] Separators in the Bookmarks toolbar are almost invisible
Remove _ensure_zstd()
Bump macos deployment target to 10.12
Clean up orphaned if-constexpr patches to clang-tidy
Windows build bustage with LTO and new pass manager enabled
Make dump-syms binary compatible with older libstdc++
Update builders to rustc 1.48
Temporarily force disabling Fission until Remote Agent is compatible
Japanese input into input fields semi-broken - IME composition string does not display in Address Book Dialog
Switching to dark or light theme in the Add-On Manager is broken - Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: addon.userPermissions is null
sideloaded updates in the profile directory may not startup correctly
Missing MOZ_CRASH reason in crash reports from Android
Add JavaException as a crash annotation
Win10 .exe file download from WeTransfer picked up and saved with .jpg extension
Add file creation time to the FileInfo struct returned by IOUtils::stat
Support setting permissions in IOUtils
Support setting permissions when we create a directory with IOUtils
Do not pass already_AddRefed<nsIFile> to IOUtils::RunOnBackgroundThread
IOUtils: Add equivalent of OS.File.exists
Expose focused BrowsingContext to script.
Print modal turns inaccessible when toggling between paper size using static custom values
Most extension xpcshell tests (e.g. xpcshell-common.ini) are skipped on Android x86-64
